column4: is there any way to connect my phone to the pc? (Nec 411i). in windows you need some nec software to do it, any equivilant program in linux?
he doesn't need to delete or re-install
deleting it is just as good \=
takes 2 minutes through the config wizard
you don't need to delete or re-install though
if you have nvidia-glx-new, the driver's section in xorg.conf will be lost
it will get put back when you do dpkg-reconfigure
ok, that's how i solved my problems anyway \=
actually, not reinstall, just re-check it in the restricted drivers
you don't need to do anything other than "dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg"
